column4: How do I go about installing KDE in a typical Ubuntu 5.1 setup?
Good.  I just reset my password.
Can I install KDE in Ubuntu?
: yes
:  sudo aptitude install kubuntu-desktop
Thanks.
: you can also get kde 3.5.1 if you change your repos..
O_o;;
Whaaaa?
It's nigh on 475 megs' worth of data.
I'll install kubuntu-desktop overnight or something.
: it's fast. Well.. I did the opposite, I started from a fresh kubuntu and installed ubuntu-desktop :)
I suppose GNOME is lighter than KDE.
: hmm.. I like both, so I install both , simple as that :)
Fedora Core 4 gave me the luxury of installing both at startup.
I mean to say both at installation.
: but the magic of ubuntu is to come in one CD.
: and with free shipping !
Including both environments?
: no..
Ah.
